entries.femaleVariant: Another sinner finds himself in the place he belongs. A trunk. Gustavo now suffers the purgatory he deserves.
Gustavo Orta is dead. Killed by his own hand.
You had an opportunity to free Gustavo Orta from sin. But you left him there.
Those who exact justice do so on behalf of our Lord. You've done well, V.
This man will now live to avoid the consequences of his actions – that is, until Judgment Day comes. We didn't want to wait that long.
Remember – God takes note of your transgressions. As do I.
How did you get him to do it? Or, actually, no… Don't tell me. She who reveals her secrets erodes her own trustworthiness and reputation.
entries.maleVariant: How did you get him to do it? Or, actually, no… Don't tell me. He who reveals his secrets erodes his own trustworthiness and reputation.

entries.femaleVariant: What's important is the result I asked for is the result I received. Contract closed.
And perhaps has a moment to examine his conscience. Let's hope he finds it before the trunk opens back up.
I know this isn't always easy, and that's why I applaud your decision today. Contract closed.
Gustavo Orta is dead. Killed by his own hand.
And you walk away with a clear conscience, no? Contract closed.
I don't know what you told him, but I see he came to understand the gravity of his sin and sought out the justice he deserved.
